A4.text: Denmark proper is situated between the North Sea to the west and the Baltic Sea to the east.

A5.text: Denmark, Sweden and the Russian Empire dominated the political relationships on the Scandinavian Peninsula for centuries.

A6.text: Denmark was part of the Danish realm in what is now southern and western Sweden and southeastern Norway
